B_PAD.synopsis: Line spoken when the character interacts with an astrolabe / armilarry sphere, mapping the celestial bodies. This could be placed anywhere in the game, so shouldn't refer to specific surroundings.

B_PAD_0.speaker: Player
B_PAD_0.context: NodeContext: Gale: Reflective tone - this item embodies some of his ambition/eventual quest for godhood
